column5: Last Friday I applied the brakes to have not only the brake lights come on, but also the left turn signal....solid.  The turn signal works fine on it's own, until I apply the brakes at which time the left one stops blinking, front and back....any thoughts on this?  the car is a 2007 Kia Sportage...warranty period is over...  Thanks Maureen
Change the flasher unit round looking thing in fuse panel or it will tell you which one or a blown bulb some cars do this as a warning
Stop dropping LSD into the fuel tank! Okay maybe it's just me.
check the rear light sockets you may have a bad ground or a shorted socket
